First Name Last Name Email Phone Number
{{contact.firstName}} {{contact.lastName}} {{contact.email}} {{contact.phoneNumber}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from 'src/app/models/contacts'; import { ContactService } from 'src/app/services/contact.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact-list', templateUrl: './contact-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-list.component.scss'] }) export class ContactListComponent { contacts: Contact[] = []; constructor(private contactService: ContactService) {} ngOnInit() : void { this.contactService.getContacts().subscribe((result: Contact[]) => (this.contacts = result)); } }
